statements: UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe_updated', email = 'john_doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET account_balance = 500.00, password = 'new_password' WHERE username = 'jane_doe';
UPDATE users SET account_balance = account_balance + 1000 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET password = 'newpassword123', account_balance = 500.00 WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
UPDATE users SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE username = 'johndoe';
UPDATE permissions SET description = 'Access to financial reports' WHERE permission_name = 'financial_reports_access';
UPDATE users SET email='new_email@example.com', password='newpassword123' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE permissions SET description='Updated description' WHERE permission_id=2;

UPDATE users SET password='newpassword' WHERE user_id=1;
